articles.description: ALAN CARR'S husband Paul Drayton has sparked concern after sharing a photo of himself with a black eye, before telling a fan 'we had a bad row'.

articles.author: Lucy Murgatroyd
articles.title: Gordon Ramsay BANS daughter Tilly from dating Strictly dancer after she signs up for the show... - The Sun
articles.content:
GORDON Ramsay has banned daughter Tilly from dating her Strictly partner after signing up for the show. 
It was revealed earlier today on This Morning that the 19-year-old will be one of the famous … [+2615 chars]
